review: We absolutely love our Amazon Fire TV. After deciding to cut back on our cable plan, we purchased the Amazon Fire. We rarely watched cable and when we did, it was mostly kids shows (we have two sons). Anyway, this item is awesome! It was easy to get set-up, and it's very easy to use. There is tons to watch for free and when we've wanted to purchase a particular movie or show, it was quick, easy, and painless. :)  We love our Amazon Fire and use it daily. I would highly recommend this product! Great job, Amazon!!
